import React from'react';import"./Pagination.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Pagination=function Pagination(_ref){var currentPage=_ref.currentPage,itemsPerPage=_ref.itemsPerPage,totalItems=_ref.totalItems,paginate=_ref.paginate;// console.log('Total items:', totalItems); // Log totalItems here
